name: M2MicroSmartLight
0:
”Alexa, control lights”
”Turn on the ceiling lamp”
”turn off the ceiling lamp”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: control lights
des:
M2Micro smart light is an intelligent hardware, To use your Amazon Echo with your M2Micro smart light, make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your light, you have your M2Micro smart light, and activate the M2Micro smart light skill. This will require your M2Micro smart light app account email and password to authorize Alexa to access your lights.
To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your M2Micro account and discover your lights.

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which light to use. You can set the lights' name in M2Micro Smart Light app which controls your lights.And the you can control the lights.

Your now talk directly to the Amazon Echo through the Alexa.

For example, turn on the <lights' name>
